title: Actions
disclaimer: Changes you make to your resume are saved automatically to your browser's local storage. No data gets out, hence your information is completely secure.

importExport.heading: Import/Export
importExport.body: You can import or export your data in JSON format. With this, you can edit and print your resume from any device. Save this file for later use.

printResume.heading: Print Your Resume
printResume.body: You can simply press <1>Cmd/Ctrl + P</1> at any time while you're in the app to print your resume, but here's a fancy button to do the same thing, just 'cause.

loadDummyData.heading: Load Dummy Data
loadDummyData.body: Unclear on what to do with a fresh blank page? Load some dummy data with prepopulated values to see how a resume should look and you can start editing from there.

reset.heading: Reset Everything!
reset.body: This action will reset all your data and remove backups made to your browser's local storage as well, so please make sure you have exported your information before you reset everything.
